Web Manager

 check website





Steps to check your website

1.click on the button on top right corner "Check Website".


2.It will redirect to website checking page & then add your
website details for checking whether the links are working
good or not.


3. if the website was running good then nothing will show.
if their is any error then it will mail with the error details


4. After checking your website error then you can restart.
the process
